disclaimer.title: IMPORTANT NOTICE
disclaimer.text: Alerts are based on unverified community reports. This app does not provide legal advice.

alert.description: Witnessed ICE activity? Click to send an alert with the location to lawyers and community members who can help.

signUp.title: SIGN UP
signUp.description: Are you a lawyer or community member who wants to help? Sign up to receive email alerts when someone reports ICE activity. Each alert will include the incident address.

addressInput.title: Enter address
addressInput.label: Address
addressInput.placeholder: Ex: 123 Main St at Oak Ave, Chicago
addressInput.helperText: Be as specific as possible (address, cross street, landmark)

confirmation.title: Confirm Alert
confirmation.question: Send alert to {{count}} subscribers?
confirmation.reminder: Remember: Only report activity you are actually witnessing.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Alert the Community is a tool created to help communities protect each other. When someone witnesses ICE activity, they can send an instant alert with the location to lawyers and community members who can help.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: 1. A witness sees ICE activity and presses the alert button
howItWorks.step2: 2. Enters the specific address or location of the incident
howItWorks.step3: 3. Confirms and sends the alert to all subscribers
howItWorks.step4: 4. Lawyers and community members receive an immediate email with the location

privacy.title: Privacy and Security
privacy.text1: We don't track your GPS location - you manually enter the address
privacy.text2: We don't store personal information of alert senders
privacy.text3: All alerts are anonymous to protect witnesses

safety.title: Safety Tips
safety.tip1: Only report if you're in a safe location
safety.tip2: Be as specific as possible with locations (address, cross street, landmarks)

legal.title: Legal Disclaimer
legal.text1: This application does not provide legal advice
legal.text2: Alerts are based on unverified community reports
legal.text3: Use at your own risk and discretion
